Beogradski vodovod: Stabilizovano vodosnabdevanje Urgentnog centra

03 Nov 2019, 09:10

Stabilno vodosnabdevanje Urgentnog centra ponovo je uspostavljeno danas oko 12.30, pošto je prethodno došlo do prekida izazvanog kvarom na vodovodnoj cevi u Pasterovoj ulici, saopštilo je Javno komunalno preduzeće Beogradski vodovod i kanalizacija. Navodi se da je za ostale potrošače koji su zbog kvara ostali bez vode, normalizacija vodosnabdevanja predvidjena do 22 časa. "Na predmetnom delu vodovodne mreže, koja je stara 50 godina, nije bilo većih defekata tokom prethodnih godina", stoji u saopštenju. Urgentni centar je jutros ostao bez vode zbog pucanja vodovodne cevi u Pasterovoj ulici u centru Beograda pa je ta zdravstvena ustanova primala samo pacijente sa hitnim stanjima. Pacijenti su tokom problema sa vodosnabdevanjem, upućivani u KBC "Zemun" i "Dr Dragiša Mišović".

Belgrade Water Supply: Stabilized Water Supply of the Emergency Center

03 Nov 2019, 08:10

The Stable Water Supply of the Emergency Center was re-established today around 12.30pm, having previously been interrupted by a malfunction on the water pipe in Pasterova Street, Public Utility Company Belgrade Water Supply and Sewerage said. It is stated that for other consumers who lost their water because of a malfunction, normalization of water supply is foreseen by 10 pm. "There has been no major defect in the water supply network, which is 50 years old, in previous years," the statement said. The Emergency Center was left without water this morning due to the bursting of a water pipe in Pasterova Street in downtown Belgrade, so the health care facility only received emergency patients. Patients were referred to KBC "Zemun" and "Dr Dragisa Misovic" during the water supply problems.
